remarks: Norm of differences around common element.  Part of Lemma 3.6 of [Beran] p. 101.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
norm3dif.1 $e |- A e. ~H $.
norm3dif.2 $e |- B e. ~H $.
norm3dif.3 $e |- C e. ~H $.
norm3difi $p |- ( normh ` ( A -h B ) ) <_ ( ( normh ` ( A -h C ) ) + ( normh ` ( C -h B ) ) ) $.
